bootstrapper:
Hi there,

Firstly reinstall Synapse (link at the bottom) and run Synapse X as administrator. If this does not fix it, run Synapse with a VPN. We highly recommend ProtonVPN as its free, safe, and works perfectly unlike other VPNs such as Hotspot.

Synapse: https://mega.nz/file/TsQBkaTZ#a5fbStB8gjPmSdUVFA5IT43N-WogqfNn-dvRXhqmRwQ
Proton: https://protonvpn.com/download

Best regards.
C2-2:
Hi there

Press win + r , then type %appdata% go to Discord, then go to folder 0.0.306, then modules, and then discord_desktop_core
Right click on index.js and click edit

Delete everything except for module.exports = require('./core.asar');

Best regards.
Checking status:
Hi there,

Assuming your windows version is up to date, ensure you have Synapse excluded by your antivirus and you have no unknown antiviruses in your programs (press Win + R & appwiz.cpl)

If reinstalling synapse and running as administrator does not work, create a new user on the PC (Settings > Accounts > Family & other users > Add someone else to this PC). Next change the new user account type to administrator and download synapse there.

Best regards.
Black box:
Hi there,

https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/2977003/the-latest-supported-visual-c-downloads 
Install BOTH x86 and x64
Ensure you actually open both installers and click install
Restart your PC, run synapse as administrator

Best regards.
Large:
Hi there,

Navigate to the Synapse X folder, find the bin folder, delete it and run synapse as administrator.
If this does not fix the issue, run synapse with a VPN. We recommend https://protonvpn.com as its free, safe and it works unlike other free VPNs.

Best regards.
Stuck on injection:
Hi there,

Assuming your windows version is up to date, please reinstall Synapse & ROBLOX.

If the prior fix does not resolve the issue, press Win + R, type appwiz.cpl, remove any antiviruses you may have.

Best regards.
You already have a synapse account:
Hi there,

Go to Settings > System > About and select the Rename PC button in the right column under PC. Then type the name you want to rename the computer. Once entered, restart your PC.

Best regards.
User Account:
Hi there,

Go to settings > accounts > family & other users > Add someone else to this PC.

Create a new user and change the account type to administrator.

Now log into the new user and download synapse.

Best regards.
More than one instance:
Hi there,

Restart your PC and try using legacy UI and tell me if the same thing happens. Also, open task manager, look for any synapse instances or anything containing 'cefsharp' and end process.

Best regards.
Inactive:
Ticket closed due to inactivity.

Regards, nausea
Internal:
Hi there,

Head over to Settings > Time & Language > Date & time > Set time & timezone automatically then run Synapse.

If the following fix doesn't work, Go to Settings > System > About and select the Rename PC button in the right column under PC. Then type the name you want to rename the computer. Once entered, restart your PC.

Best regards.
web-auth:
Hi there,

Download the HitManPro antivirus software, when asked for an email type in “a.a@a.com”. Once done, run a “Scan Threat”, when it’s finished restart your computer. After that, download Malwarebytes and run a “Thread Scan” as well. Once done, remove any suspicious tasks that show up, restart your computer, then redownload Synapse.

Hitmanpro: https://www.hitmanpro.com/
MalwareBytes: https://malwarebytes.com/

Best regards.
24H:
Hi there,

Please message an administrator within the Synapse X discord server with the hostname of every PC you've used Synapse on

You can retreive the hostname by typing 'hostname' in command prompt.

If you have not yet been invited to the server, add nausea#2832 to receive an invite

Best regards.
Discord:
Hi there,

Please add nausea#2832 on Discord to receive an invite to the official Synapse X Discord server.

Best regards.
lua-decomp:
Hi there,

Navigate to the Synapse X folder, locate the bin folder, replace lua-decomp.exe with the following: http://www.filedropper.com/lua-decomp

If lua-decomp does not already exist in the folder, then just put the new file inside.

Best regards.
antivirus:
Hi there,

Firstly, press Win + R, type 'appwiz.cpl' uninstall any antiviruses you may have and especially anything named 'SAntivirus'. Now head to Settings > Updates & security > Windows security > Open windows security > virus & threat protection > Manage settings, disable realtime protection and download Synapse.

 Extract the Synapse X folder then head back to Settings > Updates & security > Windows security > Open windows security > virus & threat protection > Manage settings > Exclusions and add the Synapse X folder as an exclusion. You may re-enable realtime protection now.

Best regards.
Failed to find instance:
Hi there,

Firstly, please ensure you're downloading and running ROBLOX from the site (https://roblox.com) and not from the microsoft store. If you are running from the site and the error persists, reinstall both Synapse X and ROBLOX.

Synapse: https://mega.nz/file/TsQBkaTZ#a5fbStB8gjPmSdUVFA5IT43N-WogqfNn-dvRXhqmRwQ
ROBLOX: https://roblox.com

Best regards.
Verify:
Hi there,

Please add and DM nausea#2832 on Discord to be verified in the official Synapse X Discord server.

Best regards.
Password:
Hi there,

In the Synapse folder, open the auth folder, and delete the token.bin file. Then, open Synapse again and click 'forgot password'. You will be emailed a reset token; the rest is straightforward.

Best regards.
6 months:
Hi there,

Your appeal is automatically denied due to your ban occuring 6+ months ago.
Please do not create further tickets regarding your ban.

Best regards.
Accepted:

After confirming the validity of your ban reason(s), we've decided to unban you from the server.
